name: web-querystring-snprintf
notes: Further verification is needed to determine whether the QUERY_STRING may contain special characters that could lead to injection, and whether the size of url_buf is sufficient.

name: web-popen-hardcoded
description: In the fcn.0000ac68 function of genie.cgi, the use of popen to execute the hardcoded command "internet set connection genieremote 1" was discovered. Although HTTP parameters are not directly passed, it is still recommended to review all command execution points.
notes: Although currently secure, it is recommended to review all command execution points

name: web-strncpy-usage
description: Five instances of strncpy calls were found in genie.cgi, primarily used for handling HTTP response headers and NVRAM configuration data. All usage scenarios include length checks or process internal data, making them relatively safe but improvable with more secure alternatives.
notes: Recommend replacing with safer string handling functions
